title: St Mary Magdalene de’ Pazzi Novena

days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

I adore Thee, O Eternal Father, and I thank Thee on the part of Thy beloved Daughter, St Mary Magdalene de Pazzi, for all the graces Thou granted her, and in particular for having chosen her as the resting place of Thy Divine Being, in that manner, and as far as mortal creatures can become capable thereof, and for having promised her to grant her whatsoever she would ask Thee, saying to her, Bride of My Only-Begotten Word, ask of Me what thou wilt.
I beg of Thee, for the sake of her merits and prayers, to infuse into my heart a true humility and conformity to Thy Divine Will.
I adore Thee, O Jesus, Word Incarnate, and I thank Thee, on the part of Thy most loving Bride, St Mary Magdalene de Pazzi, for all the gifts Thou granted her, especially for those five with which Thou didst adorn her.

Concluding Prayer

I adore Thee, O Spirit Paraclete, and I thank Thee, in the name of Thy dear Disciple, St Mary Magdalene de Pazzi, for all the gifts granted her by Thee, for having chosen her for Thy agreeable dwelling place, and particularly for the seven times Thou didst infuse Thyself into that most pure soul, under seven various forms of cloud, of fire, of column, of river, of dove, of wind, and of flames, in order to strengthen her in the temptations and sufferings she was to endure during the five years of her trial, having made her victorious over hell itself. 
I beg of Thee, O Spirit of Sovereign Goodness, to grant me strength in all adversities and temptations in life and death, and to enkindle in my heart a burning flame of Thy Love.
Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
Saint Mary Magdalene de Pazzi, pray for us!
